entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with rain. Temperature steady near 7.

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except southeast 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 6:34 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
